answers.a: High reliability, lower stability and maintenance free feature in much larger space compared with conventional switchgear
answers.b: High reliability, higher safety and maintenance free feature in much larger space compared with conventional switchgear
answers.c: High reliability, lower safety and maintenance free feature in much smaller space compared with conventional switchgear
answers.d: High reliability, higher safety and maintenance free feature in much smaller space compared with conventional switchgear

questions.question: The space requirement of GIS can be less than ______ of the space taken up by an equivalent conventional installation.

answers.a: To localize the effects of faults by operation of protective equipment and so automatically disconnect faulty point from the system
answers.b: To break efficiently the short circuits without giving rise to dangerous conditions
answers.c: To facilitate the redistribution of local, inspection and maintenance on the system
